Posts.Content: Hi Scotland, totally normal to feel like this. I had my chemo in 2013 and the first one really is the worst but after you have had it you will be fine. It is really not as bad at all as you think it will be. I cold capped so was in for about 5 hours but everyone is so lovely and before you know it you will be finished with chemo xxxx Good Luck xxxx
Posts.Title: Having a wobble
